ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
mini = nil

baseScale=2
health=6
imageScale=1.4
modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098259770184191/4C2050EF880E3E40209B574978A012599429554C/"
modelScaleX=1.1
modelScaleY=1.1
name="Mechanized Porkchop"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

baseScale=1.2
health=3

modelScaleX=0.66

name="Zombie Chihuahua"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},

            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    if mini ~= nil then

    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    attachments = model.getAttachments()

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},

        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)

    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)

    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end

    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098362943252150/72064EC12F7EB0118AB25C7F790882642C84EFEA/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Jack Daw"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},

     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)

    rebuildUI()
end

    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()

    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},

        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)

    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)

    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end

     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end

    rebuildUI()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
mini = nil

baseScale=1.2
health=5
imageScale=1.3
modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098467434461941/BAE341AB4EFA098C298890D18F2C377F26D895F6/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Rail Worker"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    objectData =  self.getData()

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},

        if (mini ~= nil) then

                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then

                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen

    miniguid = ''

    end

     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)

    rebuildUI()
end

modelScaleY=0.66
name="High River Monk"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

baseScale=1.2
health=4

modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Kamaitachi"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={

        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
mini = nil

baseScale=1.2
health=5
imageScale=1.5
modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098467434390405/1D342C99E39C191F7D38114473846C70EBB51ED0/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Tengu"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)

    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do

        })

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},

                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then

                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen

     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)

    rebuildUI()
end

modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098362943207945/3ED17FDB63B6B08F40DB68893DEF4A1AF7AEC4C9/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Desperate Mercenary"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})

    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},

        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

baseScale=1.6
health=6

modelScaleX=0.88
modelScaleY=0.88
name="Void Hunter"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})

    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},

        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

function ui_pingmini(player)

        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then

    end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},

        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},

    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
mini = nil

baseScale=1.2
health=4
imageScale=1.1
modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098259768572885/452A1D74D62D4F52B4975F826834B64C5F70D820/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Apprentice Wesley"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

baseScale=0.2
health=8

name="Tidecaller"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"

    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},

                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen

    }

end

name="Sand Worm"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

end

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},

     mini = miniguid
    }

    rebuildUI()
end

        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
mini = nil

baseScale=1.2
health=4
imageScale=1.4
modelImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1651098467434575251/AE5C59B135AF31659652E5D9F5A4690B33E75D7A/"
modelScaleX=0.66
modelScaleY=0.66
name="Shadow Effigy"

prototypes = {
    base = '000000',
}

function createModel()
    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    if mini ~= nil then
        pos = mini.getPosition()
        pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z}
        mini.destruct()
    end
    objectData =  self.getData()

    -- print('NickName: ',objectData.Nickname)
    -- print('Desc: ',objectData.Description)
    -- print('Color: ',objectData.ColorDiffuse.r,objectData.ColorDiffuse.g,objectData.ColorDiffuse.b)
    -- print('Image: ',objectData.CustomImage.ImageURL)
    
    modelPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(prototypes.base)
    model = modelPrototype.clone({position=pos})

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end
    model.setDescription(objectData.Description)
    model.setName(objectData.Nickname)
    model.script_state =  "{\"bars\":[[\"Health\",\"#55aa22\"," ..health .."," ..health..",true,true]],\"markers\":[]}"
    --  {bars={{'Health','#55aa22',health,health,true,true}},markers={}}
    
    mini = model
    -- end
end

function ui_pingmini(player)
    if (mini ~= nil) then
        if (player.pingTable ~= nil) then
            player.pingTable(mini.getPosition())
        end
    end
end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},
        {name='ui_location', url=root..'location.png'},
        {name='ui_bars_new', url=root..'bars_new.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_u', url=root..'arrow_u.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_d', url=root..'arrow_d.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_l', url=root..'arrow_l.png'},
        {name='ui_arrow_r', url=root..'arrow_r.png'},
    }

    assetBuffer = {}
    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function rebuildUI()
    
    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
            {tag='InputField', attributes={fontSize='24', preferredHeight='40'}},
            {tag='ToggleButton', attributes={fontSize='18', preferredHeight='40', colors='#ffcc33|#ffffff|#808080|#606060', selectedBackgroundColor='#dddddd', deselectedBackgroundColor='#999999'}},
            {tag='Button', attributes={fontSize='12',textColor='#111111', preferredHeight='40', colors='#dddddd|#ffffff|#808080|#f6f6f6'}},
            {tag='Toggle', attributes={textColor='#cccccc'}},
        }},
        
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='ui_pingmini', image='ui_location',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='20', height='20', position='-40 -110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }},
        {tag='button', attributes={onClick='createModel',text='Spawn Model',  colors='#ccccccff|#ffffffff|#404040ff|#808080ff', width='120', height='20', position='0 110 -5', rotation='0 0 180' }} 
    }
    
    self.UI.setXmlTable(ui)
end

function onSave()
    miniguid = ''
    if mini ~= nil then
        miniguid = mini.getGUID()
    end
    local save = {
     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)
end


function onLoad(save)
    local data = JSON.decode(save)
    mini = getObjectFromGUID(data.mini)
    rebuildUI()
end

    local pos = self.getPosition()
    pos = {x=pos.x, y=pos.y + 2, z=pos.z+2}

    model.setScale({x=baseScale, y=1, z=baseScale})
    attachments = model.getAttachments()
    for key,value in pairs(attachments) do
        modelElement = model.removeAttachment(0)
        modelElement.setCustomObject({
            image = modelImage,
            image_secondary = modelImage,
            image_scalar = imageScale
        })
        modelElement.setScale({x=modelScaleX, y=modelScaleY, z=0.2})
        model.addAttachment(modelElement)
    end

    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},

    end

     mini = miniguid
    }
    return JSON.encode(save)

function ui_pingmini(player)

    end

function rebuildAssets()
    local root = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RobMayer/TTSLibrary/master/ui/';
    local assets = {
        {name='ui_power', url=root..'power.png'},
        {name='ui_gear', url=root..'gear.png'},
        {name='ui_close', url=root..'close.png'},
        {name='ui_plus', url=root..'plus.png'},
        {name='ui_minus', url=root..'minus.png'},
        {name='ui_reload', url=root..'reload.png'},

    local bufLen = 0
    for idx,guid in pairs(mapI2G) do
        local mini = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if (mini ~= nil) then
            for i,marker in pairs(mini.call('getMarkers', {})) do
                if (assetBuffer[marker.url] == nil) then
                    bufLen = bufLen + 1
                    assetBuffer[marker.url] = self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen
                    table.insert(assets, {name=self.guid..'_mk_'..bufLen, url=marker.url})
                end
            end
        end
    end
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

    local ui = {
        {tag='Defaults', children={
            {tag='Text', attributes={color='#cccccc', fontSize='18', alignment='MiddleLeft'}},
